Talent Applicant Tracking System

Boost your productivity with AI-powered automation to efficiently source and screen candidates

Start Your Free Trial Today 

Intelligence Streamlined Talent Acquisition Solution

An AI-powered Talent Applicant Tracking System (ATS), streamlines your recruitment, enhances candidate experience, ensures compliance, and leverages intelligent automation for data-driven decisions to efficiently hire the best-fit candidates

  • Customize recruitment funnel on your own

    Experience unmatched cutting-edge customization and innovation to tailor each stage of your recruitment funnel. Adapt and optimize your hiring process to meet unique needs, ensuring efficient talent acquisition and sustained success.

  • Leverage AI intelligence to identify top talent

    Harness the power of AI candidate matching to precisely identify the best-fit candidates for your roles. Our advanced matching score and ranking system ensure that you focus on the most qualified talent, streamlining your hiring process and driving better outcomes.

  • Boost your reach with seamless Job Board Integration

    Expand your job reach effortlessly across a wide network of integrated job boards, both free and paid. Benefit from real-time search, streamlined posting, and increased visibility to attract top talent faster.

Customize recruitment funnel on your own

Say goodbye to scattered resumes and emails. Oorwin's centralized platform streamlines candidate management, making it easy to track applications and source the best talent throughout the recruitment process.

Leverage AI intelligence to identify top talent

Harness the power of AI candidate matching to precisely identify the best-fit candidates for your roles. Our advanced matching score and ranking system ensure that you focus on the most qualified talent, streamlining your hiring process and driving better outcomes

Boost your reach with seamless Job Board Integration

Expand your job reach effortlessly across a wide network of integrated job boards, both free and paid. Benefit from real-time search, streamlined posting, and increased visibility to attract top talent faster.

Oorwin

The Next-Generation Applicant Tracking System

Revolutionize your talent acquisition with Oorwin's AI-powered ATS. Streamline candidate sourcing, engagement, and management to attract and retain top talent efficiently. Our advanced platform simplifies the recruitment process, saving you time and resources while finding the perfect fit for every role.
Experience the future of recruitment with Oorwin's all-in-one solution.
Get in Touch

Source The Best Talent

Centralized Application Hub

Say goodbye to scattered resumes and emails. Oorwin's centralized platform streamlines candidate management, making it easy to track applications and source the best talent throughout the recruitment process.

Tailored Workflows

Create automated workflows that align seamlessly with your recruitment process. Oorwin simplifies tasks like application review, interview scheduling, and candidate communication, ensuring a smooth and efficient hiring experience.

Innovation at Our Core

Stay ahead of the competition with our cutting-edge features and continuous product updates. We ensure your business remains innovative, adaptive, and ready to meet the evolving demands of the market.

Precision Talent Matching with AI

Intelligent Sourcing

Utilize AI to uncover top talent in your existing database. Oorwin analyzes job descriptions and expertly matches them with candidates, assessing their fit based on skills and experience.

Reduced Bias

Eliminate unconscious bias from the hiring process. Oorwin's AI-powered matching focuses on candidate qualifications, ensuring you select the best fit for the role regardless of background.

AI-Driven Matching

Understand the rationale behind Oorwin's candidate recommendations. Our matching scores and detailed analytics provide compelling evidence to support your hiring decisions.

Seamless Interview Management

Schedule Interviews with Ease

Schedule interviews seamlessly within Oorwin and send invites via your preferred video conferencing platform, such as Google Meet, Microsoft Teams, or Zoom.

Candidate Communication

Easily coordinate interviews, automate reminders, and share updates, keeping candidates informed and engaged while maintaining consistent communication through integrated tools on our platform.

Collaborative Hiring

Engage your hiring team seamlessly in the selection process with features like candidate scorecards, centralized feedback collection, and streamlined collaboration tools.

Elevate Your Employer Branding

Seamless Career Page Integration

Easily connect your careers page, allowing candidates to apply directly through your website, ensuring a smooth and streamlined application process.

Personalized Candidate Experience

Customize communication and automate updates to keep candidates engaged, enhancing their journey while highlighting your company culture throughout the hiring process.

Optimize Recruitment with Analytics

Reporting and analytics

Make informed hiring decisions with data-driven insights. Monitor team performance and visualize key metrics on a customizable dashboard for efficient, streamlined recruitment.

Oorwin: More Than Just an ATS

Experience a comprehensive talent acquisition platform that streamlines your entire hiring journey, from sourcing and screening to onboarding.

Oorwin seamlessly integrates with your existing CRM and HRMS, creating a unified hub for managing your entire recruitment lifecycle.

Experience the magic of Oorwin

Get in touch with us or try it out yourself

Get Started For Free
